snippet: The San Jose Sharks will host the Los Angeles Kings in an outdoor game at the 49ers’ new stadium in Santa Clara, Calif., on Feb. 21.
abstract: San Jose Sharks will host Los Angeles Kings in outdoor hockey game at San Francisco 49ers' new football stadium in Santa Clara, Calif, on Feb 21.
lead_paragraph: The San Jose Sharks will host the Los Angeles Kings in an outdoor game at the 49ers’ new stadium in Santa Clara, Calif., on Feb. 21.

headline.main: Sharks and Kings to Play Outside
headline.print_headline: Sharks and Kings to Play Outside
